snippet: Kristin Davis, who spent months at Rikers Island for running a prostitution ring, is accused of illegally buying and selling prescription pills containing controlled substances.
abstract: New York City comptroller candidate Kristin Davis is arrested and accused of illegally buying and selling prescription pills containing controlled substances; Davis spent time at Rikers Island in 2008 for running prostitution ring that she claimed provided escorts to rival candidate Eliot Spitzer.

byline.original: By BENJAMIN WEISER and E. C. GOGOLAK

lead_paragraph: Kristin Davis, who spent months at Rikers Island for running a prostitution ring, is accused of illegally buying and selling prescription pills containing controlled substances.

headline.main: Ex-Madam, Now Candidate For Comptroller, Is Arrested
headline.print_headline: Ex-Madam, Now Candidate For Comptroller, Is Arrested
